name: Social Media Training Program
description:
Made for GMTK2021: Chained Together

Have you ever lost hours of the day, endlessly scrolling through twitter, wasting what precious time you have on our wonderful planet?

WELL WASTE NO MORE!

With this fantastic new training program, you can learn the secret of how to:

1. Make twitter enjoyable once again!

2. Find free time throughout the day!

3. Have a better outlook on life! 

Simply click download and extract the files to a location of your choosing. Then, click the training program and start regaining control over your life.

Social Media Training Program: Take back your life!

(A MOUSE IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED)
